title: How to Update Your R4I SDHC 3DS to Work on 3DS V4.4.0 10

steps.headline: Download the newest firmware on the official site, unzip it and put the files and folders into the root directory of your SD card.
Start your r4i sdhc 3ds on your ds or dsi, go to the third selection "setting", enter it, select the "upgrade", then press "start" to start upgrade your card
Then it will begin to upgrade auto, don't power off during the updating and make sure your console is full power or else the power outage during the updating will cause your card to get damaged.
Reboot the console once the updating is finished and now your r4i sdhc 3ds can work on 3DS v4.4.0-10 perfectly.

text: Download the newest firmware on the official site, unzip it and put the files and folders into the root directory of your SD card.  Start your r4i sdhc 3ds on your ds or dsi, go to the third selection "setting", enter it, select the "upgrade", then press "start" to start upgrade your card  Then it will begin to upgrade auto, don't power off during the updating and make sure your console is full power or else the power outage during the updating will cause your card to get damaged.  Reboot the console once the updating is finished and now your r4i sdhc 3ds can work on 3DS v4.4.0-10 perfectly.
